timeline.message:
Keep previous behaviour of FieldHighlighter::highlightOffsetsEnums

LUCENE-9093 modified how FieldHighlighter breaks texts into passages,
which doesn't work well with elasticsearch custome BoundedBreakIteratorScanner.
This commit for now keeps previous behaviour of FieldHighlighter.

timeline.bodyText: I think we can remove XIntervals now that LUCENE-9050 is released - just use plain Intervals instead.
timeline.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: @romseygeek Thanks for the comment. Looks like Intervals.multiterm expects Automaton, while a FuzzyQuery can only produce CompiledAutomaton.  Or is there any other way to use Intervals.multiterm?
replies.author: mayya-sharipova

replies.bodyText: Hm, maybe we need to put a fuzzy method directly on Intervals then.  Let's leave XIntervals in there for the moment, I'll open a lucene ticket to clean this up.
replies.author: romseygeek

timeline.bodyText: This just overrides LUCENE-9093 and preserves the previous behaviour, correct? +1 if so
timeline.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: exactly, it just preserves the previous behaviour.
replies.author: mayya-sharipova
